file.name: problem-test.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
paths:
  /ok-default-use-problem:
    get:
      responses:
        "400":
          $ref: 'https://teamdigitale.github.io/openapi/0.0.5/definitions.yaml#/responses/400BadRequest'
        default:
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Problem'
            application/problem+xml:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Problem' 
  /ko-default-use-problem:
    get:
      responses:
        default:
          content:
            application/json: {}
  /ko-error-use-problem:
    get:
      responses:          
        "400":
          content:
            not/problem: {}

  /ko-bad-schema-use-problem:
    get:
      responses:
        "500":
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                type: object
                required:
                - foo
                properties:
                  foo:
                    type: string
  /ko-string-problem:
    get:
      responses:
        "400":
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ko_Problem'

components:
  schemas:
    Problem:
      properties:
        type:
          type: string
        title:
          type: string
        status:
          type: integer
          format: int32

    ko_Problem:
      properties:
        message:
          type: string
        code:
          type: integer
          format: int32

Error: parse: paths: /ok-default-use-problem: get: operation "": responses: 400: resolve "https://teamdigitale.github.io/openapi/0.0.5/definitions.yaml#/responses/400BadRequest" reference: invalid response reference: "https://teamdigitale.github.io/openapi/0.0.5/definitions.yaml#/responses/400BadRequest"
